name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Dark Duel Stories
description:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Dark Duel Stories, released in Japan as Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters III: Tri-Holy God Advent (遊戯王デュエルモンスターズＩＩＩ　三聖戦神降臨 (トライホーリーゴッドアドバント) Yūgiō Dyueru Monsutāzu III Toraihōrīgoddo Adobanto), is a Game Boy Color video game and the third title in the Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters series of games. It was released in Japan on July 13, 2000, and it was the first Yu-Gi-Oh! video game to be released outside of Japan, with a United States release date of March 19, 2002.
Players of the game can trade and battle with other players using a link cable.
